work_areas.title: Discovery & Planning
work_areas.description: Understand current state and plan the migration

work_areas.title: Preparation
work_areas.description: Set up target environment and tooling

work_areas.title: Validation & Cutover
work_areas.description: Verify everything works and switch over

packets.title: Audit current system
packets.scope: Document what exists today. List all components, dependencies, data flows, integrations. Output: audit.md

packets.title: Define target state
packets.scope: Document where we're going. Describe target architecture, technology choices, expected improvements. Output: target-state.md

packets.title: Create migration plan
packets.scope: Plan the migration sequence. Identify what can be migrated independently vs. together. Define rollback procedures. Output: migration-plan.md

packets.title: Set up target environment
packets.scope: Provision and configure the target system. Verify it's ready to receive migrated components.

packets.title: Create migration tooling
packets.scope: Build or configure tools for the migration. Data transformation scripts, sync utilities, validation tools.

packets.title: Set up parallel running
packets.scope: Configure ability to run old and new systems in parallel. Set up traffic splitting or shadow mode if applicable.

packets.title: Migrate batch 1 (low risk)
packets.scope: Migrate first set of components per migration plan. Start with lowest risk items. Validate after migration.

packets.title: Migrate batch 2 (medium risk)
packets.scope: Migrate next set of components. Apply lessons learned from batch 1. Validate after migration.

packets.title: Migrate batch 3 (high risk)
packets.scope: Migrate remaining components including critical systems. Extra validation. Have rollback ready.

packets.title: Full system validation
packets.scope: End-to-end testing on target system. Verify all functionality works. Compare outputs with source system.

packets.title: Cutover
packets.scope: Switch production traffic to new system. Execute cutover plan. Monitor closely for issues.

packets.title: Decommission old system
packets.scope: After validation period, shut down old system. Archive data and configs. Update documentation.
